articles.title: Facebook signs first deal to buy renewable energy in India - DAWN.com
articles.description: CleanMax will own and operate the projects, Facebook will buy the power off the grid using environmental attribute certificates.
articles.content:
Facebook has signed a deal to buy renewable energy in India from a local firms wind power project, the social media giants first such deal in the South Asian nation, the companies said on Thursday.

articles.title: Sharp increase in Infosys employee attrition is a cause of worry: Investec - Mint
articles.description: Infosys reported a voluntary attrition rate of 15.2% for its IT services segment during the March quarter, up from 10% in the preceding quarter.

articles.description: Sputnik V Vaccine Uses, efficacy: The Sputnik V vaccine, developed by Gamaleya National Research Institute of Epidemiology and Microbiology in Moscow, uses two different viruses that cause the common cold (adenovirus) in humans.
